entries.name: nhits
entries.info: Number of hits associated with this cluster

entries.name: nclusters
entries.info: Total number of clusters in the event

entries.name: z
entries.info: Z-coordinate of the cluster in millimeters (mm)

entries.name: phi
entries.info: Azimuthal angle (phi) of the cluster in radians (rad)

entries.name: time
entries.info: Time of the cluster in nanoseconds (ns)

entries.name: energy
entries.info: Energy deposited in the cluster in MeV

entries.name: order
entries.info: Order of the hit (0 = inner, 1 = outer)
